5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) said: ‘If anyone of you becomes drowsy, let him sleep until he feels refreshed, for he does not know, if he prays when he feels drowsy, he may want to say words seeking forgiveness but (instead) he ends up cursing himself.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُصَلِّي إِذَا نَعَسَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about if the person praying becomes sleepy
